verses.verse: Many times <S%H7227><s%> they have afflicted <S%H6887><s%> me from my youth <S%H5271><s%> up. <S%H3478><s%> Let Israel now say, <S%H559><s%>
many times <S%H7227><s%> they have afflicted <S%H6887><s%> me from my youth <S%H5271><s%> up, <S%H3201><s%> yet they have not prevailed against me.
The plowers <S%H2790><s%> plowed <S%H2790><s%> on my back. <S%H1354><s%> They made their furrows <S%H4618><s%> long. <S%H748><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is righteous. <S%H6662><s%> He has cut apart <S%H7112><s%> the cords <S%H5688><s%> of the wicked. <S%H7563><s%>
Let them be disappointed <S%H954><s%> and turned <S%H5472><s%> backward, <S%H268><s%> all those who hate <S%H8130><s%> Zion. <S%H6726><s%>
Let them be as the grass <S%H2682><s%> on the housetops, <S%H1406><s%> which withers <S%H3001><s%> before <S%H6927><s%> it grows up; <S%H8025><s%>
with which the reaper <S%H7114><s%> doesn't <S%H4390><s%> fill his hand, <S%H3709><s%> nor he who binds sheaves, <S%H6014><s%> his bosom. <S%H2683><s%>

Neither do those who go by <S%H5674><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> "The blessing <S%H1293><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> be on you. <S%H1288><s%> We bless you in the name <S%H8034><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>"
